definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)

sentences.english: Generously padded footbed massages the foot with each and every step.
sentences.chinese: 慷慨填充鞋垫按摩脚每一步。

sentences.english: Latex and cork blend footbed offers increased cushioning and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 乳胶和软木混合鞋垫提供更多的缓冲和舒适。

sentences.english: Special Jerry Hsu photo portrait footbeds.
sentences.chinese: 特别许克威照片肖像鞋垫。

sentences.english: This is my insoles for your left scars satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 这是我为你纳鞋垫留下的疤。

sentences.english: The Nike shox has a slot beneath the cushion that lines the shoe.
sentences.chinese: 耐克弹力柱鞋在鞋垫下方有一个狭缝。

sentences.english: Removable PU foam insole may help accommodate a personal orthotic.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸的聚氨酯泡沫鞋垫可以帮助容纳个人的矫正。

sentences.english: Orthotics are usually custom-made using a plaster model of your foot.
sentences.chinese: 矫正鞋垫通常用石膏模型量足定做。

sentences.english: Leather lining and cushioned footbed for all-day support.
sentences.chinese: 皮革衬里和垫鞋垫全天支持。

sentences.english: Moisture-wicking suede footbed with arch support and cupped heel.
sentences.chinese: 排汗绒面鞋垫足弓支撑和巨脚跟。

sentences.english: Dr. Scholl's Air-Pille Insoles help take the place of that fatty tissue.
sentences.chinese: 司各尔博士气式鞋垫可以替代脚底的脂肪层。

sentences.english: This was more of an insole issue.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题更多是由鞋垫引起的。

sentences.english: Canvas lining with lightly cushioned footbed for added comfort.
sentences.chinese: 帆布衬里，轻轻垫鞋垫，增加舒适度。

sentences.english: Textile lining with cushioned footbed for added comfort.
sentences.chinese: 纺织面料增加舒适性与缓冲鞋垫。
皮革衬里和皮革覆盖的鞋垫。

sentences.english: Ultra padded footbed provides all-day cushioned comfort and arch support to your delicate feet.
sentences.chinese: 超填充鞋垫提供全天软垫舒适你娇嫩的脚，足弓支撑。

definition: fitting one's feet (of shoes or socks)
